# Third-Party Code & Attribution

This folder tracks third-party components used by MnemoPane.

## Waveshare e-Paper Driver (vendored)

- Vendor: Waveshare
- Device: 7.3inch e-Paper HAT (E)
- Source: https://www.waveshare.com/wiki/7.3inch_e-Paper_HAT_(E)
- Upstream package/version:
  - Date acquired: YYYY-MM-DD
  - Link to downloaded archive (if applicable): (paste)
  - Notes: copied minimal driver subset into:
	- `firmware/src/drivers/epd/upstream_waveshare/`
